page.title: The $itemName
page.text: The $itemName is a powerful short range Energy weapon, that fires multiple phaser bolts at once. The weapon also has an alternative fire that inflicts a single powerful plasma shot.

page.title: The $itemName
page.text: The player can combine the multiple plasma bolts by holding down the right mouse button and then releasing. If charged for enough time the $itemName can fire a single plasma bolt that can travel twice the distance.
Ranged rogue androids can also wield this weapon, and can be quite deadly at close range and can deal quite the knockback.
The $itemName allows for all types of weapon modules except weapon sights.

page.title: Stats
page.text: The $itemName can also be dropped by Ranged Rogue Androids. There are also Legendary versions of the shotgun dropped only by Legendary Rogue Androids. The Legendary versions can have increased base stats that can stack with weapon modules. Stats such as higher meta, fire rate and greater accuracy.
